alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:59PM CDT until August 04 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blue Springs to near Geneva, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Malvern, Rehobeth, Avon, Madrid, Gordon, Black, Memphis, Crosby, Grangeburg and Wilson Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
